battlecode.common
Class RobotInfo

java.lang.Object
  battlecode.common.RobotInfo

public class RobotInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Struct that stores basic information that was 'sensed' of another Robot. This info is ephemeral and there is no guarantee any of it will remain the same between rounds.

Author:
Teh Devs

eventualEnergon

public final double eventualEnergon
Eventual energon level of this Robot if reserve were allow to completely transfer. Math.min(energonLevel + energonReserve, maxEnergon)
